statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, serial_number FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT location, maintenance_record FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location='Office' AND maintenance_record IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipments FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, location, maintenance_record, serial_number FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Main Building';
SELECT equipment_id, serial_number FROM equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_record IS NULL;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM equipment_inventory GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Lab%' AND serial_number LIKE 'SN%';
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, location, serial_number FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT serial_number, location FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY serial_number DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Office%';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, location, serial_number FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT equipment_id, serial_number, maintenance_records FROM equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_records IS NOT NULL ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, location, maintenance_records FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location='Workshop' AND maintenance_records LIKE '%inspection%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC, log_id DESC;
SELECT e.equipment_id, e.location, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_description FROM equipment_inventory e INNER JOIN maintenance_logs m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, location FROM equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT id, serial_number FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Storage' AND serial_number LIKE 'SN%';
SELECT m.maintenance_id, e.id, e.serial_number, m.maintenance_date FROM maintenance m JOIN equipment e ON m.equipment_id = e.id;
SELECT e.id, e.location, COUNT(m.maintenance_id) as maintenance_count FROM equipment e LEFT JOIN maintenance m ON e.id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY e.id, e.location ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT id, serial_number, location FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance;
SELECT technician_name, expertise FROM technicians;
SELECT serial_number, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT technician_name, expertise FROM technicians WHERE expertise LIKE '%database%';
SELECT maintenance_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician, description FROM maintenance WHERE maintenance_id > 100 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, location, serial_number FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type='Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT equipment_id, location, serial_number FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location='Office' ORDER BY equipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, serial_number, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_id, serial_number, location, maintenance_record FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, serial_number, location, maintenance_record FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;

SELECT e.equipment_id, e.serial_number, e.location, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM equipment_inventory e JOIN maintenance_records m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
